name: Nightzoid
description:
Search, search and search. Here's how you can find the answers.

Nightzoid is a horror game, combined with puzzle, that will make you extremely curious.

You enter a house to find out the mystery, but you have to avoid the "Zoid". To find out the mystery, you have to solve the puzzles and complete the endings.

Search and read the letters to find out the story.

- 10 Endings
- +200 achievements
- 13 letters
- 30 items
- many rooms and places to explore
